Package com.cdd.lab5

package com.cdd.lab5
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Follower
    Implements Runnable and demonstrates a Follower thread which "dances" but only if there is a Leader thread waiting to "dance."
    Leader
    Implements Runnable and demonstrates a Leader thread which "dances" but only if there is a Follower thread waiting to "dance."
    LeaderFollowerQueue
    This class contains all the variables required to synchronise the Leader and Follower classes such that they execute in pairs.
    Main
    Driver containing the main class.
